subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In the last few years, Penn State Coach Joe Paterno has overcome health problems, an attempted overthrow by his superiors and a dearth of talent that resulted in four losing seasons in five years.
snippet: In the last few years, Penn State Coach Joe Paterno has overcome health problems, an attempted overthrow by his superiors and a dearth of talent that resulted in four losing seasons in five years.
